import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz';
import Navbar from './';
import NavbarSection from '../navbarSection';
import Link from '../link';
import Brand from '../brand';

# Navbar

<Playground>
  <Navbar color="grayLight3">
    <NavbarSection>
      <Brand 
        imagesrc="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        title="Logo" 
        href="#"
        width="25px"
        p="10px" 
      />
    </NavbarSection>
    <NavbarSection alignment="center">
      <Link>Home</Link>
      <Link>Projects</Link>
      <Link>Docs</Link>
    </NavbarSection>
    <NavbarSection alignment="right">
      <Link>Sign out</Link>
    </NavbarSection>
  </Navbar>
  <Navbar bg="grayLight3" borderBottom="1px solid" borderColor="grayLight3">
    <NavbarSection alignment="center">
      <Link>Layers</Link>
      <Link>Images</Link>
      <Link>Analysis</Link>
    </NavbarSection>
  </Navbar>
</Playground>

### Navbar PropTypes

| Prop | Type | Required | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:---------|:------------|
| color | string | false | see [styled-system COLOR](https://github.com/jxnblk/styled-system/blob/master/docs/api.md#color) |
| bg | string | false | see [styled-system COLOR](https://github.com/jxnblk/styled-system/blob/master/docs/api.md#color) |
| ${borders} | string | false | see [styled-system BORDERS](https://github.com/jxnblk/styled-system/blob/master/docs/api.md#borders) |
| boxShadow | string | false | uses styled-system but documentation is poor. accepts typical css box-shadows |

### NavbarSection PropTypes

| Prop | Type | Required | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:---------|:------------|
| alignment | enum | false | ["left", "center", "right"] |
| space | string | false | see [styled-system SPACE](https://github.com/jxnblk/styled-system/blob/master/docs/api.md#space) |
| flex | string | false | see [styled-system FLEX](https://github.com/jxnblk/styled-system/blob/master/docs/api.md#flexbox) |
